posts.title: nginx配置PATH_INFO
posts.text: 本地的环境是Homestead。 Homestead的站点配置： 12345678910111213141516folders: - map: ~/Code to: /home/vagrant/Code schedule: truesites: - map: chanzhieps.app to: /home/vagrant/Code/chanzhieps/www schedule: true``` 安装的是一个叫蝉知的cms系统[蝉知](http://www.chanzhi.org/)，一个很优秀的系统。 Homestead中http://chanzhieps.app的配置文件路径为：```bash/etc/nginx/sites-available/chanzhieps.app 其配置如下： 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142server { listen 80; listen 443 ssl http2; server_name chanzhieps.app; root "/home/vagrant/Code/chanzhieps/www"; index index.html index.htm index.php; charset utf-8; location / { rewrite ^/$ /index.php last; # 修改处 rewrite ^/(?!index\.php|robots\.txt|uploadedImages|resource|images|js|css|styles|static|theme|zui)(.*)$ / index.php/$1 last; # 修改处 } location = /favicon.ico { access_log off; log_not_found off; } location = /robots.txt { access_log off; log_not_found off; } access_log off; error_log /var/log/nginx/chanzhieps.app-error.log error; sendfile off; client_max_body_size 100m; location ~ ^(.+\.php)(.*){ # 修改处 fastcgi_split_path_info ^(.+\.php)(.*)$; # 修改处 fastcgi_pass unix:/var/run/php/php7.1-fpm.sock; fastcgi_index index.php; include fastcgi_params; fastcgi_param SCRIPT_FILENAME $document_root$fastcgi_script_name; fastcgi_param PATH_INFO $fastcgi_path_info; # 修改处 fastcgi_intercept_errors off; fastcgi_buffer_size 16k; fastcgi_buffers 4 16k; fastcgi_connect_timeout 300; fastcgi_send_timeout 300; fastcgi_read_timeout 300; }} 执行下面命令重启homestead: 1vagrant reload 切记千万不要使用vagrant destroy命令，会删掉机器的。
